description: This course explores the roles of women as creators, subjects, and patrons of art. It helps
students lean about how gender permeates culture and art. Specific topics vary. Each topic
introduces a time period and place that has revealed much about gender and visual culture.
Students work seminar-style yet at an introductory level for those new to art history or women's
studies. Offered periodically.  Also counts toward women's and gender studies major and
